name: Mobirise
description: Mobirise is a free, offline website builder for creating responsive, mobile-first websites without coding.
longDescription: Mobirise is a user-friendly, offline website builder designed to help users create responsive, mobile-first websites without requiring coding skills. It offers a drag-and-drop interface, making it accessible for beginners and professionals to build small to medium-sized websites, landing pages, portfolios, and promotional sites. The platform leverages Bootstrap 5 and Google AMP to ensure fast-loading, mobile-optimized sites that align with modern web standards. Mobirise provides a free version for personal and commercial use, with optional premium themes and extensions for enhanced functionality. Its mission is to empower users to establish an online presence with full control over their websites, supporting publishing to local drives, FTP, or Mobirise’s subdomain. The platform also integrates AI to generate customizable website designs based on user prompts, streamlining the creation process.
features: Drag-and-drop interface allows users to build websites visually with no coding required, ideal for beginners and rapid prototyping.
Over 10,000 pre-designed website blocks and templates offer extensive customization for various industries and purposes.
Mobile-first responsive design ensures websites adapt seamlessly to all screen sizes, passing Google’s mobile-friendly test.
AI-powered design generation creates unique website layouts from text prompts, saving time and effort.
Smart Cart extension enables easy integration with PayPal and Stripe for creating online stores quickly.
Code Editor extension allows advanced users to customize HTML/CSS and add external scripts for enhanced functionality.
Form Builder extension facilitates the creation of custom contact forms to collect user data efficiently.
Social feed integrations let users embed Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, or YouTube content to enhance engagement.
Popup Builder extension helps create pop-up windows for promotions, boosting user interaction and conversions.
Free subdomain hosting on *.mobirisesite.com or custom domain integration provides flexible publishing options.

faqs.question: Is Mobirise free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Mobirise offers a free version for both personal and commercial use, with optional premium themes and extensions for added features.

faqs.question: Do I need coding skills to use Mobirise?
faqs.answer: No, Mobirise’s drag-and-drop interface allows users to create websites without any coding knowledge, though advanced users can edit HTML/CSS with the Code Editor.

faqs.question: Can I host my Mobirise website on my own domain?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can connect a custom domain or publish to a free *.mobirisesite.com subdomain, local drive, or via FTP.

faqs.question: Does Mobirise support e-commerce features?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Smart Cart extension allows integration with PayPal and Stripe to create online stores, though subscription-based systems require manual setup.

faqs.question: Are Mobirise websites mobile-friendly?
faqs.answer: All Mobirise websites are built with a mobile-first approach using Bootstrap 5, ensuring compatibility across devices and Google’s mobile-friendly standards.

faqs.question: Can I use Mobirise offline?
faqs.answer: Yes, Mobirise is an offline app, allowing you to design websites without an internet connection, though publishing requires connectivity.

faqs.question: How does Mobirise AI work?
faqs.answer: Mobirise AI generates website designs based on text prompts, offering customizable layouts that users can further tweak with the drag-and-drop editor.

faqs.question: Can I transfer my Mobirise project to another computer?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can transfer project files by copying the projects folder from the application library and importing it into Mobirise on another computer.
